description.en: MASK20 is a tokenized derivative of the HASHMASKS NFT Collection. It enables anyone to trade NFTs from the collection in a permissionless way with instant liquidity on https://nft20.io/ routed via UniSwap. Every 100 MASK20 tokens represent an underlying  NFT, minted upon deposit into the pool on https://nft20.io/ and burned upon withdrawal from the pool.
